channel.title: Spell Editing
channel.description: I was looking at the teleporting spells in my server and wanted to edit one and make it go to Port Sarim. (and other places). In texthandler.java I found "c.sendQuest("Try out minigames", 13082);". Is the 13082 the cords (dought it). Where can I find the cords? Thanks.

item.title: Spell Editing
item.dc:creator: @benny679 benny679
item.description:
@benny679 wrote:

One more thing, it says you need a certain amount of runes, how can I change that? Can I?

Read full topic

item.title: Spell Editing
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

[quote=“benny679, post:3, topic:351652”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=448006.msg3287835#msg3287835 date=1280330559]
13082 is the interface id for the text. The coords would be in ClickingMost class.
[/quote]
Not showing up in clickingmost.java. I hit find and typed the interface id.[/quote]
Look for the coords that the spell currently takes you to.

Read full topic

item.title: Spell Editing
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

That’s not what you type in when searchng, you need to look for the coords its currently teleporting you to.

Read full topic

@benny679 wrote:

deathschaos9:

13082 is the interface id for the text. The coords would be in ClickingMost class.

Not showing up in clickingmost.java. I hit find and typed the interface id.

I was looking at the teleporting spells in my server and wanted to edit one and make it go to Port Sarim. (and other places). In texthandler.java I found “c.sendQuest(“Try out minigames”, 13082);”. Is the 13082 the cords (dought it). Where can I find the cords? Thanks.
